description: Extra properties for a Legendary / Mythic / Duo Hero.

duo_skill_id.description: Internal string identifier of the Hero's Duo skill.

bonus_effect.description: Bonus stats granted to blessed allies when this Legendary / Mythic effect is active.

kind.description: 1 for Legendary / Mythic Heroes, 2 for Duo Heroes.

element.description: The active season of this Legendary / Mythic effect.

bst.description: Stat total used by the Hero in modes like Arena.

pair_up.description: Whether the Hero supports Pair Up outside Allegiance Battles.
